to the tribal steps performed by
the real WaMsis who live in
Africa. The craze now blends the
spirited Watusi manner with
a slower spiralling Of the hips.
Include hop or two and you are
in business for the next whirl
or should | say gyration around
the dance floor.


These new dances must have
been welcomed by the chiroprac-
tors, not only for neck ailments
but for leg disorders.

ed. wear something loose. relax

as much fun--just to stand back
and complain. Get out there and

This week another civil rights protest
march waS held in the city. 1t sUas organized
by the local unit Of the Congress of Racial
Equality (CORE). The publicity chairman
for the group Lester King announced its
purposes at a press conference.


There was no attempt made by CORE lead
evs to make concerted effort to get the SUP
port of other groups and citizens Who are
certainly inv0lUed in the same struggle for
Improving race re lati0nS in Phoenix and the
state.


No one doubts that all kinds of protest
measures are warranted, however, no one
group should believe that it can operate
alone.


IN this road to gain greater equality,
mhethev in the north or south, all Negroes
should be sought to give widey support and
meaning to any type Of program.


Let us not demonstrate merely for the
sake Of thinning some publicity for one single
group or idea.


Mayor Milton Graham has announced that
the city council Will haze the public accom-
na0dati0ns proposal ON its agenda 10it)hin the
nest tho weeks. 1t is hoped that some positive
actions uil be made with the cooperation Of
all.

ments concerning the demoraliz-
ing aspects of "The Twist"
Friends and not 50 friendly per-
sons have made known their dis
like Of new dance, aptly named
1.-THE Twist"


Although there Is some doubt
HIM the historical development anc
the originator Of this dance. 1t
has stirred the country from
coast to coast--or rather should
! say from hip to hip. This tor
so gyration has caused more con-
versation than the native dance
viewed by Captain Cook on his
tour Of the South Seas several
years ago.


TMsters were once wavy do
nuts. Persons in the Midwest
knew Of tornados--by this name.
TMsters didn't get national or
International attention until sew
eral years ago.


Elvis Presley was drafted
and suddenly his kind Of body
movements we're adopted by sew
eral unknown singers and the
Twist was born.


Even in the hey-days Of his
"Blue Suede Shoes and Hound
Dog" Elvis the Pelvis did not
reach such astronomical proper
lions Of popularity.


He swooned thousands with his
sullen delivery Of tunes plus his
anatomical actions. but he wasn't
around when the wiring of the
wrist was supplanted by the thrust
Of the twisted ubias.


There's no reason to chang
ing partners. You must choose
a side in this battle. To twist
or not to tMst--that Is the ques-
ton.


For az many years 40 manhas
been able to communicate his
likes or dislikes-- something was
chosen or refuted. My grand
mother must have had to decide
whether to Turkey Trot'' or
"Minuet." Surely her Mother
was not happy when she went to
the weekend dancing nights and
performed mad trot.


No doubt sirens of old had to
use their individuality and end
the staid measures Of the courtly
waltz for a wilder polka. Who
can say that one dance Is more
immoral than another7


The hula Is a classic example
Of the problem. Hula dancing Is
an art in Hawaii. but its move
ments could cause a closedown
of a Liln St. Cyr revue.


The Tahitian hula Is known as
the whooping hula to end all hulas
but few eyebrows are raised when
dancers appear on bold Jour-
ney, via national television.


When Glenn orbited around out
earth he little realized that
within a short span Of time -
somewhere on this not SO celes-
tial globe - new and worldly
dance would be erupting.


Although haven't heard Of
it YETI am sure that beneath
the roofs from New Zealand to
New York--a new tempo is being
fitted to a new dance step. Time
may change its name from the
Shimmy. the Black Bottom, the
Apple Jack, the SLOUGH or the
Twist--but there will surely be
still on earth some pers ons who
will condemn 1t. In honor Of the
space men 1t might be called
the "Orbit Roll"


To be abs olutely sure Of learn
ing and promoting an accepted
dance--you had better join Arthur
Murrays group--l believe they
